snippet: The Southern California Metropolitan Water District tentatively priced $550 million of water revenue bonds yesterday through Bear, Stearns & Company, to yield a maximum 6.03 percent for an issue due in 2018.   Serial bonds with shorter maturities ...
lead_paragraph: The Southern California Metropolitan Water District tentatively priced $550 million of water revenue bonds yesterday through Bear, Stearns & Company, to yield a maximum 6.03 percent for an issue due in 2018. Serial bonds with shorter maturities were priced to yield from 4 percent in 1995 to 4.6 percent in 1997, 5.3 percent in 2002 and 5.8 percent in 2007.
